changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE gps ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL, latitude decimal NOT NULL, vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_gps_vehicle_id FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE PRIMARY KEY (id) );
CREATE TABLE vehicle ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, gps_id INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_gps_id FOREIGN KEY (gps_id) REFERENCES gps (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE PRIMARY KEY (id) );
